__e: There is nothing that you have said or done that is acceptable to me in the least.
Only you are acceptable to me. "The pleasure of my eyes, I'm now in pieces." All in your love.
And the hardest part is that it becomes less acceptable to be a boy.
Now then, you and I need to have a little chat about what constitutes acceptable behaviour in the workplace.
Then what makes you think it's acceptable in my home?
I don't know what you think is acceptable behavior in a law office, but I'm pretty sure it isn't carrying on with the boss' daughter.
